Verses: 1 isravel Ilaignanaayirundhapodhu Naan Avanai Nesiththen; Egipthilirundhu Ennudaiya Kumaaranai Varavazhaiththen.
2 avargal Thangalai Azhaikkiravargalin Mugaththukku Vilagippoivittaargal; Paagaalgalukkup Paliyittu, Vikkiragangalukkuth Thoobankaattinaargal.
3 naan Eppiraayeemaik Kaipidiththu Nadakkap Pazhakkinen; Aanaalum Naan Thangalai Gunamaakkugiravarendru Ariyaamarponaargal.

4 manusharaik Katti Izhukkira Anbin Kayirugalaal Naan Avargalai Izhuththen, Avargal Kazhuththugalinmel Irundha Nugaththadiyai Eduththup Podugiravaraippola Irundhu, Avargal Patcham Saaindhu, Avargalukku Aagaarankoduththen.
5 mananthirumbamaattomendradhinaal Avargal Egipthudhesaththukkuth Thirumbippovadhillai; Aseeriyan Avargalukku Raajaa.
6 aagaiyaal Avargaludaiya Aalosanaigalinimiththam Pattayam Avargal Pattanangalukkul Paaindhu, Avargal Thaazhppaalgalai Nirmoolampanni, Avargalaip Patchikkum.
7 en Janangal Ennaivittu Vilagugira Maarupaattaip Patrikkondirukkiraargal; Avargalai Unnadhamaanavaridaththil Varavazhaiththaalum Oruvanum Ezhumbugiradhillai.

8 eppiraayeeme, Naan Unnai Eppadik Kaividuven? Isravele, Naan Unnai Eppadi Oppukkoduppen? Naan Unnai Eppadi Adhmaavaippolaakkuven? Unnai Eppadi Sepoyeemaippola Vaippen? En Irudhayam Enakkul Kuzhambugiradhu; En Paridhaabangal Egamaaip Pongugiradhu.

9 en Ukkira Kobaththinpadiye Seyyamaatten; Eppiraayeemai Azhikkumpadith Thirumbamaatten; Enendraal Naan Manushanalla, Dhevanaayirukkiren; Naan Un Naduvilulla Parisuththar; Aagaiyaal Pattanaththukku Virodhamaaga Varen.
10 avargal Karththaraip Pinpatruvaargal; Avar Singaththaippol Gerchchippaar; Avar Gerchchikkumpodhu Avargal Sandhadhiyaar Merkuththisaiyilirundhu Nadungi Varuvaargal.

11 egipthilirundhu Kuruvigalaippolavum, Aseeriyaa Dhesaththilirundhu Puraakkalaippolavum Bayandhu Varuvaargal; Appozhudhu Avargalai Avargal Veedugalil Kudiyirukkappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
12 eppiraayeemar Poigalinaalum, Isravel Vamsaththaar Vanjagaththinaalum Ennai Soozhndhukondirukkiraargal; Yoodhaavovenil Innum Dhevanode Arasaandu, Parisuththavaangalode Unmaiyaayirukkiraan.
